1.title: San Francisco
1.plot: AWD hits the road in San Francisco, and the "City by the Bay" gives our contestants all they can handle. San Francisco's one-way streets, bus lanes, popular walking attractions, and trolley cars make for a daunting driving destination!

2.title: Boston
2.plot: Boston is one of the oldest and most confusing cities in the country. AWD will navigate the roads that were once laid out on the original paths between settlers' homes in the early 1600's, making Boston a spider web of streets and avenues.

3.title: Chicago
3.plot: America's Worst Driver visits Chicago, Illinois in its continuing search for the worst driver in the country. Four new contestants will take on the roads of Chicago as they try to navigate the largest metropolis in the Midwest.

4.title: Miami
4.plot: This week, we head south to Miami, the road rage capital of the U.S. While this stylish city is known for its sophisticated nightlife and art deco charm, Miami also has the 9th worst traffic congestion in America.

5.title: Seattle
5.plot: AWD travels to Seattle, one of America's most beautiful cities in the Pacific Northwest. Our four driver candidates will navigate the congested, confusing streets of downtown on a trip that takes them to Pike Place Market amongst other famous locales!

6.title: Los Angeles
6.plot: America's Worst Driver is heading to Los Angeles, with its beautiful beaches, movie stars, and of course, four of the worst drivers in the country. The contestants travel from Sunset Boulevard to the infamous congested roads and freeways of L.A.

7.title: New York
7.plot: The City may the contestants' home, but just *surviving* in its traffic is an accomplishment, let alone completing tasks.

8.title: Dallas
8.plot: The final city before the finals. Who will be the final finalist?

9.title: Finale: Part 1
9.plot: The worst drivers from 8 cities face 7 challenges. The least worst of each will be dropped out but they will also win a car. The loser of the final challenge will become America's Worst Driver 2010.

10.title: Finale: Part 2
10.plot: We've traveled to eight of the most challenging driving cities in America in a nationwide search to find America's Worst Driver. Now, in our two part finale, these drivers descend upon Los Angeles for one last chance at redemption. But can they handle the dangerous driving feats of the Teeter Totter, The Controlled Skid, and the Rattler Reverse Challenge?

imdb.plot outline: "Each American city has its own personality -- unique destinations that are woven together by streets and avenues. We spend hundreds of hours a year driving behind the wheel, and most of us do a pretty good job. But then...there are the others, the ones responsible for hitting something every five seconds and racking up over 175 million traffic tickets a year. Well, it's time to buckle up! With Alonzo Bodden and Jill Simonian as our guides, we're experiencing some of this country's most iconic cities in a whole new way...as we search for AMERICA'S WORST DRIVER. Nominated by a friend or family member, these human road hazards are put to the test on the scenic streets of their hometowns...with off duty traffic cops following behind them - watching and grading their every move. From there, it's on to our obstacle courses. First up is 'The Rattler', a snaking reverse track specially designed to test our drivers' steering and reversing skills. And then -- it all comes down to 'last chance lane', where the final two drivers race the clock, and each other, while trying to handle the pressure of some very extreme road conditions. The driver who can't shape up behind the wheel is crowned their city's worst driver, and to keep them off the road, we're going to destroy their car. But it doesn't end there, because we're on a quest to find America's Worst Driver. The worst drivers from around the country will meet in America's ultimate driving city -- Los Angeles -- where they will have a chance to redeem themselves and avoid being named America's Worst Driver. Facing all new challenges, the seven who show the most improvement will each win a brand new car, but one misguided motorist will pedal away with the title of AMERICA'S WORST DRIVER."
imdb.title: America's Worst Driver
plot: "Each American city has its own personality -- unique destinations that are woven together by streets and avenues. We spend hundreds of hours a year driving behind the wheel, and most of us do a pretty good job. But then...there are the others, the ones responsible for hitting something every five seconds and racking up over 175 million traffic tickets a year. Well, it's time to buckle up!
